title: Putin says US peace plan could form basis for end to Ukraine war – Europe live
summary: Putin reiterated his call for the international community to acknowledge Russia's territorial gains in Ukraine. This demand is a significant point of contention and a non-negotiable issue for Kyiv. The ongoing conflict continues to highlight the stark divide between Russian and Ukrainian positions.

title: Hong Kong fire latest: rescue crews search for survivors as death toll rises to 75 with hundreds reported missing
summary: Three men were arrested following a rescue operation at the Wang Fuk Court residential apartment complex in Tai Po district. A total of 26 rescue teams were dispatched to the site to assist. Authorities are investigating the circumstances surrounding the incident.

title: Economists warn budget built on ‘shaky foundations’; December UK interest rate cut looks more likely – business live
summary: Experts are skeptical about the feasibility of back-loaded tax rises announced in Wednesday's budget. Concerns center on whether these measures will be implemented as planned. The uncertainty raises questions about the government's fiscal strategy moving forward.

title: ‘It was just … meh’: the voters who feel ‘tinkering’ budget let them down
summary: A research group called More in Common conducted interviews with former constituents from traditionally Democratic areas, known as the 'blue wall.' They expressed dissatisfaction with recent political U-turns, describing them as "chaotic." The findings indicate a growing discontent among these voters regarding shifting party positions.

title: Celebrity Traitors star Ruth Codd recovering after second leg amputation
summary: Irish actor, who lost his leg due to a football injury, shared a TikTok video unveiling his new wheelchair. The post highlights his positive outlook and adaptability after his first amputation. Fans expressed support and admiration for his resilience and spirit.
